story_parts.text:
Lion was very excited to visit the city. He had always wanted to see the tall buildings and all the people. Lion was a bit nervous too, because he had never been to the city before.

As soon as Lion arrived in the city, he was amazed by all the sights and sounds. He saw the tall buildings, the busy people, and the bright lights. Lion walked around for a while, taking everything in.

Lion finds a place to rest and falls asleep. He has a dream in which he is walking through the city and everyone is cheering for him. In the dream, Lion feels proud and happy.

When Lion wakes up, he realizes that the city is even more amazing than he had thought. He is glad that he came to visit and can't wait to come back again.
